vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Moabites living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.22.2;
son of: Zippor (H6834)
Also named: Balak<\i> (Βαλάκ "Balak" G0904)
§ Balak = "devastator"
a king of Moab who hired Balaam to curse Israel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴勒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "破壞者"
摩押王, 僱用巴蘭來詛咒以色列
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴勒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "破坏者"
摩押王, 雇用巴兰来诅咒以色列
